div.bibl: Proodos (Progress), July 27, 1932. AT THE SUMMER RESORTS.

body.p: p. 3.--Among those who seek the cool and refreshing breezes of summer resorts to avoid the heat of the city are those below listed who with their families are enjoying their vacations at John Maglaris's Emery Fruit Farm resort.
Const. Karydes, A. Stergiou, Bas. Englezos, Dem. Karakatshneos, the Nikolopoulos brothers, and N. Roussos.
A short distance away from the Emery resort is the Riviera resort owned by A. Fasseas, where several of our compatriots are spending their vacations.
